name: Word Search Poetry Pro
description:
No ads! No iap. And we will update more poems. Try play Classic Word Search Puzzles with no time limit.
Poem Puzzles from William Shakespeare, William Wordsworth, Emily Dickinson, Walt Whitman, John Keats, Percy Bysshe Shelley, Edgar Allan Poe and many other poets.  
Word search with beautiful poems. Words are all selected from these poems.

- Over 180 word search puzzles, and more on the way!
- Beautiful daily games to keep your brain in shape.
- Play without wifi.
- Add poems to favorites, and share to your friends.
- 12 topics about friend, love, nature, animals, heroes, dreams, family, loneliness, time and so on.
